hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc export mysql_home=$(pwd) # Install dependencies sudo yum install -y git gcc gcc-c++ make cmake bison ncurses-devel util-linux tar zip wget zlib-devel bzip2.s390x libtool.s390x
wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gcc/gcc-4.8.2/gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 bunzip2 gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 tar xvf gcc-4.8.2.tar cd gcc-4.8.2/ ./contrib/download_prerequisites mkdir $mysql_home/gcc-4.8.2/build cd $mysql_home/gcc-4.8.2/build
../configure --disable-multilib --disable-checking --enable-languages=c,c++ --enable-multiarch --enable-shared --enable-threads=posix --without-included-gettext --with-system-zlib --prefix=/opt/gcc4.8
make sudo make install
export PATH=/opt/gcc4.8/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gcc4.8/lib64/
# Build and install MySQL git clone git://github.com/mysql/mysql-server.git cd mysql-server git checkout tags/mysql-5.7.21
cmake -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/opt/gcc4.8/bin/gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/opt/gcc4.8/bin/g++ -DDOWNLOAD_BOOST=1 -DWITH_BOOST=. gmake
# Execute test cases gmake test sudo gmake install
sudo cp /opt/gcc4.8/lib64/libstdc++.so.6 /usr/lib64/
# Post installation setup if !(getent passwd mysql); then sudo useradd mysql fi cd /usr/local/mysql sudo chown -R mysql . sudo chgrp -R mysql .
nohup sudo bin/mysqld --initialize --user=mysql &
sudo /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld_safe --user=mysql &
/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqladmin --version --password=grep 'root@localhost:' /home/test/nohup.out | sed 's/^.*: //'
